responsibilities: Development of 5 Svelte and 3 Angular applications for Allianz's insurance customer service portals, enhancing user engagement across Europe, Australia, and Asia.
Translated complex application improvement requirements into epics/stories and actionable tasks, achieving a 98% alignment with business objectives.

Engineered and optimized customer interaction screens using NDBX, Web Components, and reusable building block components with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and TypeScript, leading to a 15% improvement in user satisfaction.
Implemented Adobe Analytics tracking to monitor page and user interactions for the CSP project.
Achieved PCI-DSS Compliance by implementing advanced payment functionalities in Angular, reducing payment processing time by 25% and enhancing user experience.
Participated in daily standups to streamline communication and resolve development challenges, increasing team efficiency by 10%.
Achieved 80% unit test coverage for Svelte UI components using Jest, reducing production bugs and improving code quality.
achievements: Completed Scrum Basics Training in July 2022.
Successfully delivered quarterly releases of the customer service portal for Australian customers.

responsibilities: Led code reviews to improve code quality and reduce technical debt by 30%.
Designed and developed dynamic UI components and directives using Angular 12, TypeScript, and RxJS, achieving a 20% increase in application performance.
Enhanced user experience by creating intuitive screens with HTML, SCSS, Bootstrap, and KendoUI, driving a 25% increase in customer retention.
Optimized state management using NgRx based on the Redux pattern, resulting in a 15% faster application load time.
Worked with Docker, NGINX, and NodeJS for deployment and server configuration.
Delivered 80% unit test coverage using Jasmine and Karma, reducing production issues by 40%.
achievements: Awarded STAR in August 2020 for optimizing and refactoring code, achieving 80% unit test coverage in Angular.
